-.description: Subtracts numbers from the first argument.

/.description: Divides the first argument by the rest.

=.description: Checks if two values are equal.

<.description: Checks if the first value is less than the second.

>.description: Checks if the first value is greater than the second.

!=.description: Checks if two values are not equal.

<=.description: Checks if the first value is less than or equal to the second.

>=.description: Checks if the first value is greater than or equal to the second.

and.description: Logical AND for two boolean values.
and.name: and

or.description: Logical OR for two boolean values.
or.name: or

string.length.description: Returns the length of a string.
string.length.name: string.length

string.join.description: Joins a list of strings with a separator.
string.join.name: string.join

string.slice.description: Returns a substring from start to end indices.
string.slice.name: string.slice

string.includes.description: Checks if a string contains a substring.
string.includes.name: string.includes

string.trim.description: Trims whitespace from both ends of a string.
string.trim.name: string.trim

list.map.description: Maps a lambda over a list.
list.map.name: list.map

list.each.description: Applies a lambda to each element in a list (for side effects).
list.each.name: list.each

list.from.description: Creates a list from the given arguments.
list.from.name: list.from

list.nth.description: Returns the nth element of a list, or nil if out of bounds.
list.nth.name: list.nth

list.filter.description: Filters a list using a lambda predicate.
list.filter.name: list.filter

io.stdout.description: Stringifies an atom and writes it to stdout. Use `io.print` to format output.
io.stdout.name: io.stdout

io.stderr.description: Stringifies an atom and writes it to stderr.
io.stderr.name: io.stderr

io.printf.description:
Writes a formatted string to stdout. Specifiers:
 - `%s` for strings
 - `%d` for numbers
 - `%i` casts a string to an integer
 - `%f` casts a string to a float
io.printf.name: io.printf
